queuesystem.clear.success.message: The queue has been reset and cleared.

queuesystem.info.success.message: Current queue informaton: Title: [$1], Users: [$2], Max Size: [$3], Opened At: [$4]

queuesystem.join.error.joined.message: You are already in the queue.

queuesystem.open.error.clear.message: The previous queue was not cleared. Use "!queue clear" to clear it.

queuesystem.open.error.usage.message: Usage: !queue open [size] [title] - Make the size zero if you want it to be unlimited.

queuesystem.open.limit.message: The queue is now opened! Max entries are $1 users. Use !joinqueue [optional gamertag] to join it! $2

queuesystem.open.normal.message: The queue is now opened! Use !joinqueue [optional gamertag] to join it! $1

queuesystem.position.other.message: $1 is currently position #$2 in the queue and joined at: $3

queuesystem.position.other.error.message: $1 is currently not in the queue.

queuesystem.position.self.message: You are currently position #$1 in the queue and you joined at: $2

queuesystem.position.self.error.message: You are currently not in the queue.

queuesystem.queue.list.empty.message: No users are in the queue.

queuesystem.queue.next.message: Users to be picked next are: $1.

queuesystem.remove.404.message: That user does not seem to be in the queue.

queuesystem.remove.removed.message: User $1 has been removed from the queue!

queuesystem.usage.message: Usage: !queue [open / close / clear / next / list / pick / position / info]
